item.title: Windows Processes
item.description: General powershell # Verbose tasklist /v # Dlls used per process tasklist /m # Service within process tasklist /svc # Filter tasklist /FI "<KEY> eq <VALUE>" tasklist /FI "USERNAME eq NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" # Help tasklist /? Monitoring Process powershell Template # Define the process name $processName = "<PROCESS>" # Define the interval in seconds between checks (e.g., 5 seconds) $interval = 5 # Start an infinite loop while ($true) { # Check if the process is running $process = Get-Process -Name $processName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue if ($process) { # If the process is found, perform your action Write-Host "<PROCESS> process is running.
